title: "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working"
body:
When I double click on the "League of Legends" icon on my desktop, I instantly receive the error message,

"PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working"

Then there is only one option to click which is "Close Program"

I have uninstalled LoL and attempted to reinstall it through league's official website, but again I still receive the same error message,

"PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working

I tried run as admin doesnt work , tried changing comparability doesnt work 

i would love solution if you have :)

replies.body: Running as admin is a great start, because this error is super common with security settings blocking your way.  Run through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure League is being added as an exception.

Didn't work i tried all the options and nothing worked 
but thanks

That's strange, sorry to hear.  :/  Do you possibly have any anti-virus or third party programs that could be getting in the way?

Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect some logs, and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can work with you directly to get this figured out!

i downloaded the hextech repair tool but to be honest i cant use it because i can't even install the game because of this problem
i tried countless time to install but it just doesn't let me and when i wrote this problem i also posted a ticket
but right now if i could have download the full game from site and not just the starter client riot give "LeagueofLegends_EUNE_Installer_2016_11_10" i think that problem my only problem cause i tried on my brother computer to install and it do the same problem and i try all the solutions and nothing work.
But thanks for all the help u given and if u have more i'm open for solutions

It really does sound like a security setting that's simply not allowing League from being used at all.  See if you can try running it As Administrator, otherwise, hit us up in a ticket anyway and we'll dig deeper!
Thanks for all the help i hope the problem would solve with riot help
